price: ئىبراھىم: «مەن قېرىغان تۇرسام، ماڭا (بالا بىلەن) خۇشخەۋەر بەردىڭلارمۇ؟ ماڭا نېمە بىلەن خۇشخەۋەر بېرىۋاتىسىلەر؟» دېدى[54].
arabic: قَالَ أَبَشَّرۡتُمُونِي عَلَىٰٓ أَن مَّسَّنِيَ ٱلۡكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla abashartumūnī ʿalā an massaniya al-kibaru fabima tubashirūna
translations: Do you give me glad tidings
Do you give me glad tidings
